name: Virtua Striker 4 Ver.2006
overview: Virtua Striker 4 Ver. 2006 is an update to Virtua Striker 4, released for Triforce arcade hardware in 2006. Ver. 2006 carries over most of the teams in Virtua Striker 4, but swaps out 11 of them, including Peru, Egypt, Morocco, Israel, Wales, Austria, Hungary, Kuwait, Quatar, U.A.E. and Tonga.
